fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: **Sketch** Copy your target's ability. If they have multiple, one Is picked at random.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may only have 3 sketched abilities at all time.
-You may decide at any point to forget one of your sketched abilities.

fields.name: Pok√©mon Ability:
fields.value: **Own Tempo** You can use your sketched abilities twice per night (but you cant use more than one sketched ability per night)
